abstract: If you need an hourly reminder to do something, you can get a third-party app or just use software included with your Apple device.
snippet: If you need an hourly reminder to do something, you can get a third-party app or just use software included with your Apple device.
lead_paragraph: Q. I am an 84-year-old sedentary person and I need some kind of alarm program that reminds me to get up every hour. I could set the alarm on my iPad/iPod every hour, but that is a pain.

headline.main: Setting Hourly Alarms on Apple Devices
